title: Thunderhead
medium: oil stick and graphite on construction paper
inscriptions: l.c. in pencil: NOTE: [underlined] EACH LETTER WILL FLASH ON/OFF SEPARATELY AND / IN A RANDOM SEQUENCING PATTERN. THE DRAPERY LINES/ WILL BE IN CLEAR BLUE ARGON AND WILL ALWAYS BE ON./ THE WHITE & YELLOW LIGHT FROM THE LETTERS WILL ONLY BE SEEN/ INDIRECTLY [underlined] AS IT REFLECTS OFF THE WALL./ THE SIDES OF THE TUBES FACING THE VIEWER WILL BE PAINTED OUT- SEE DETAIL; l.l. in pencil: "THUNDERHEAD"; l.c. in pencil: PROPOSAL FOR NEON PIECE; l.r. in pencil: Leland P. Johnston `83
